reviews.title: Epic conclusion to the MCU saga
reviews.content: Avengers: Endgame delivers an emotional and satisfying conclusion to over a decade of storytelling. The final battle is absolutely spectacular.

reviews.title: Joaquin Phoenix's masterclass performance
reviews.content: A haunting portrayal of mental illness and society's failures. Phoenix completely transforms into the character with incredible depth.

reviews.title: Visually stunning sci-fi masterpiece
reviews.content: Denis Villeneuve brings Frank Herbert's complex world to life with breathtaking visuals and Hans Zimmer's incredible score.

reviews.title: Multiverse done right
reviews.content: Seeing all three Spider-Men together was pure magic. The nostalgia factor combined with great storytelling makes this special.

reviews.title: Nolan's mind-bending masterpiece
reviews.content: Inception is a complex, layered narrative that rewards multiple viewings. The practical effects and cinematography are outstanding.

reviews.title: Cruise delivers again
reviews.content: A worthy sequel that honors the original while bringing modern thrills. The aerial sequences are absolutely breathtaking.
